name: Numeral Operation
description:
NOTE: To complete in time for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021 deadline, I had to submit with some known build errors. I couldn't quite pinpoint the cause of these errors, and they seem to only affect minor things with the game, like quitting to the main menu.

Take control of some unnamed blue character with an interesting quirk -- the ability to absorb other characters! Doing so adds to their displayed number, and you must use that power to solve puzzles!

CONTROLS:

Press Left Mouse Button to shoot a numbered character.

Press Right Mouse Button to place a numbered character.

Press Escape to pause.

Yellow gates can only be passed through by numbered characters (the yellow guys).
